oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Richard Peck
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Richard Peck was the first chair of the English Department. After his death in 1974, his wife Virginia, who was also a member of the department, established the Richard C. and Virginia L. Peck Fund. The mission was to provide scholarships to English majors and English graduate students. The plaques on the wall near PH 302 list the names of Peck Award recipients since the first year of the awards in 1974. Richard Peck is the namesake of Peck Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: English teachers; College teachers; Middle Tennessee State University
